package.name: jcv_hole_filling
package.description: This package is for filling invalid pixels (0 or NAN) in kinect frames and refining them(denoising spatial noise). This method is based on: "Depth hole filling using the depth distribution of neighboring regions of depth holes in the Kinect sensor" DOI: 10.1109/ICSPCC.2012.6335696
package.author: Vahid Azizi
